verses.text: A Song \add or\add* Psalm for the sons of Korah, to the chief Musician upon Mahalath Leannoth, Maschil of Heman the Ezrahite. O LORD God of my salvation, I have cried day \add and\add* night before thee:
Let my prayer come before thee: incline thy ear to my cry;
For my soul is full of troubles: and my life draweth nigh to the grave.
I am counted with them that go down into the pit: I am as a man \add that hath\add* no strength:
Free among the dead, like the slain that lie in the grave, whom thou rememberest no more: and they are cut off from thy hand.
Thou hast laid me in the lowest pit, in darkness, in the deeps.
Thy wrath lieth hard upon me, and thou hast afflicted \add me\add* with all thy waves. Selah.
Thou hast put away my acquaintance far from me; thou hast made me an abomination to them: \add I am\add* shut up, and I cannot come forth.
My eye mourneth by reason of affliction: LORD, I have called daily upon thee, I have stretched out my hands to thee.
Wilt thou show wonders to the dead? shall the dead arise \add and\add* praise thee? Selah.
Shall thy loving-kindness be declared in the grave? \add or\add* thy faithfulness in destruction?
Shall thy wonders be known in the dark? and thy righteousness in the land of forgetfulness?
But to thee have I cried, O LORD; and in the morning shall my prayer come before thee.
LORD, why castest thou off my soul? \add why\add* hidest thou thy face from me?
I \add am\add* afflicted and ready to die from \add my\add* youth up: \add while\add* I suffer thy terrors I am distracted.
Thy fierce wrath goeth over me; thy terrors have cut me off.
They came around me daily like water; they encompassed me together.
Lover and friend hast thou put far from me, \add and\add* my acquaintance into darkness.
